игра очень хорошая но валв приносят все новые и новые баги в игру

Как человек , с 1000+ часами , проведенными в этой игре , я могу сказать вам несколько пунктов , что бы стать счастливым 
----
1-Выходите из нее н@хуй
2-Заходите в библиотеку 
3-Правой кнопкой мыши по игре , и нажмите удалить ...
4-Всё , вы себя осчастливили ;3
这个游戏不好玩，1000小时入门。才600多小时的我太菜。
I love this game, most of the people I play with seem to be nice and will communicate during competitive matches. I love how there are so many maps.

Это очень прекрасная  игра где процветает кибербуллинг и мёртвые матери(рекомендую)

This game is very cool...but unfortunately matchmaking is now invaded by a lot of cheaters and we can't play as much as before...Valve must take attitude and ban all this idiots...some skins are very cool but the glove case is very annoying because give to us a lot of junks...anyway if this game will be the one that was once I will play it again...but until Valve will not solve the problem with cheaters it will be bad...the community it's destroyed by that bots..we have Overwatch now so we can ban them...but there are too many cheaters for us. I hope this big problem will be solved as soon as possible. I think this is a very nice game and we should play it.

CS:GO has too many cheaters... I realize that most of them are legit, but we should have bots to automatically see hacks tbh. Good game overall though.

Overrated game with a toxic community and a high skill ceiling, but it's fun.

Outstanding title! as always from Valve. Don't let the shite player base you'll come across now and again deter you, hands down the best multiplayer shooter you can find. Just play it, you'll love it. Beats Source even, despite the endless amounts of customization and map creation options for Source. Smoother, looks better, plays rough but still tenfold better than Source. Seriously, just play it.
